Click this banner to go to the Parent Toolkit
The District offers "Pay For It" to help you to manage your child’s lunch account more conveniently.

span.a: 2019 - 2020 School Hours, Emergency Closings & Delayed Opening Info

div.div: West Milford Board of Education meeting at Westbrook Elementary School Read More
Leaders at Lunch is a program where athletes go to Macopin during their lunch period and talk about all of the opportunities at the high school for athletics. Read More

a.title: West Milford Named District of Character

div.a: West Milford Named District of Character
div.div: West Milford one of only 7 districts in the nation to be named District of Character Read More

West Milford Public Schools-Transportation Department has openings for the following positions: School Bus Drivers, SUV Drivers and Vehicle Aides. We train for CDL License with Air Brake, Passenger and School Bus Endorsements. Read More
Kindergarten registration for West Milford residents will begin January 15, 2020, for those children who will be five (5) years old on or before October 1, 2020. Read More

Districts that purchase the Frontline Insights Platform also gain access to the Frontline Education mobile app! The user-friendly app provides increased accessibility to key features such as absence creation, Leave Balance recognition, and multiple absence tracking tools. Read More
The West Milford School District has been recognized as a Common Sense District. Find out more Read More

td.a: West Milford Named District of Character

West Milford is now recognized
As a Common Sense District
Click Here for More Information

West Milford has earned
MSA CESS Accreditation
